author: costin
msg: Merged Container and Context, patched everything to work again.
Amazing, the tests are still passing.
Context will be cleaned and reorganized soon, using ContextInterceptors.

author: costin
msg: - fixed minor bug in yesterday move of RequestUtil ( sm )
- added a printStackTrace to StringManager - if it can't find the
string, something is really bad and we can't ignore it
- as a result, added a missing message - it has to be cleaned up!
- tests - added runclient.sh - you can start the server with tomcat start,
then run runclient as many times as you want or use a browser to do
individual tests.
- temporary commented out y2k - it has to be rewriten, it shouldn't depend
on tomcat internals ( HttpDate ) on the client side, all other tests are
on the server side.

author: craigmcc
msg: Initial check-in of the documentation (index.html) and Java source code
associated with the "Tomcat.Next" proposal.
NOTE:  These files represent the ***initial*** proposal.  As changes are
incrementally made to the actual Tomcat source tree, modifications to
these sources will undoubtedly be made -- but only in the main CVS tree.

author: costin
msg: Minor change - removed core.properties.
It was used only to get engineHeader.
Added setter for engineHeader ( will be used by the
new/cleaned configuration).
Compute the default value only if needed instead of
on constructor.

author: costin
msg: Utils to util.
Moved LocaleToCharsetMap and RequestUtil to tomcat.util.
